channel.title: Ok umm a command ::yell?
channel.description: could any post me the command to ::yell? i accidently just deleted mine :(

item.title: Ok umm a command ::yell?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

if(command.startsWith("yell")) { String yell = command.substring(5); String[] censor = {"no-ip", "servegame"}; for(String s : censor) if(yell.toLowerCase().contains(s)) { sendMessage(playerName+": "+yell); // This basically makes them think that the message has been sent to avoid having them attempt to evade the censor. return; } PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": "+yell; }
If your server has muting you can use that in this command, too.

Read full topic
